attributes.action: Royal Commission or cut the red tape #CSAInquiry INDEPENDENT
attributes.additional_details:
The Child Sex Abuse Inquiry needs to be led independently with no Government ties what so ever - it appears this is not the case.  The message to the Government is clear:

Stop, don't rush - it has taken years to get this far, this needs to be victim focused.

The CSA Inquiry needs to be led independently with zero connection to the Government - only then can it be dealt with honesty and transparency.

This has to be about victims - they have to come 1st, their voices have been silent for too long.

No more cover ups! Cut the red tape or a Royal Commission is needed.  Our PM is our PM because WE put him there, our politicians too, it is time this country protected victims!

No more cover ups - INDEPENDENT

Let justice mean JUSTICE
